Usage for HCPÂ¶

nextflow-20.04.1-all run ~/nf/set_alpha10v0/set-nf/main.nf \
    --tractoflow tractoflow_output/ \
    --surfaces freesurfer_output/ \
    -profile freesurfer_basic \
    -with-singularity ~/nf/set_alpha10v0/set_alpha10v0.img \
    -resume
